body_html: I don't think we can expect our users to necessarily know when we will be and won't be saving buffers, so being inconsistent based on whether we actually have buffers can lead to surprising results.
body_text: I don't think we can expect our users to necessarily know when we will be and won't be saving buffers, so being inconsistent based on whether we actually have buffers can lead to surprising results.
body: I don't think we can expect our users to necessarily know when we will be and won't be saving buffers, so being inconsistent based on whether we actually have buffers can lead to surprising results.
